attributes.action: Make a Law Protecting Armed Forces Personnel (and their Associates) from Being Discriminated against in Anyway, shape, or Form
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like a Law to be made/changed protecting all Armed Forces Personnel (and Associates like the ACF's Personnel) being discriminated against in all forms. This is because I feel that the are not respectes enough and are in some cases even treated unfairly. I feel strongly that this needs to change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
